item.title: ALB Controller with AWS Cognito and Google Oauth
item.description: At $WORK we needed to expose some apps that don’t have a login flow (eg alertmanager, prometheus), these are running in kubernetes. Since I found the documentation a little bit confusing I decided to create this blogpost to document to others (here myself from the future included). Most examples here will be in terraform, which can be easily translated to the UI. Requirements ExternalDNS setup A domain you already know All required permissions to create all necessary stuff First let’s create a user pool and a domain.
